Project

"The HQ Sessions"
Acoustic Recording Sessions

Real. Raw. Country Music.

The Country Rebel HQ Sessions produces some of the best acoustic country music content on the internet today. From Home Free's angelic pipes to the rough and weathered voice of Aaron Lewis, since its inception the sessions have hosted a wide array of amazing musical talent.

Click Above For Full Session Playlist

What I Worked On

I was responsible for directing, recording, editing, and color correcting, corresponding with talent and management teams for optimum release ROI, mixing and mastering acoustic music, establishing a look and feel, and evolving the sessions from iPhones and handheld recorders to DSLRs and multi-channel preamplifiers. After we established a Creative Video Content Team and hired a couple of editors, I was promoted to the company's Manager of Creative Content.
